summary: Completed testing of HITL Analytics Dashboard with Recharts charts and language toggle verification across HITL Analytics, Elite Report, and Dashboard pages. All features working correctly.

minor.issue: keyword_trends returns objects instead of strings for some keywords (e.g., {"labeling": ["rusak"]} instead of "rusak"). Frontend handles this gracefully with filter.

backend: HITL Overview endpoint returns correct data structure (risk_distribution, queue_stats, keyword_trends, response_time)
HITL Timeline endpoint returns dates and series (level_1, level_2, level_3)
HITL Moderator Performance endpoint returns moderators list with action breakdown
HITL Export JSON endpoint returns full export data with summary
HITL Export CSV endpoint returns CSV content
HITL Overview works with 7, 30, 90 day ranges
frontend: HITL Analytics page loads correctly for admin users
6 Metrics Cards displayed: Total Flagged (16), Level 1 (11), Level 2 (3), Level 3 (2), Avg Response (25m), Approval Rate (100%)
Recharts Pie Chart for Risk Distribution showing Normal/Sensitive/Critical percentages
Recharts Bar Chart for Moderation Status showing Approved count
Recharts Area Chart for Risk Timeline with Level 1/2/3 series
Keyword Trends section with horizontal bar chart
Moderator Performance table with Admin user actions
Export JSON button present and clickable
Export CSV button present and clickable
Language toggle on HITL Analytics page works (ID/EN)
Language toggle on Elite Report page works (ID/EN) - ADDED
Language toggle on Dashboard page works (ID/EN)
Dashboard Elite Progress tab shows stats cards (Tier, Reports, Modules)
Dashboard Elite Progress tab shows module usage breakdown

critical_code_review_comments: HITLAnalyticsPage.js correctly implements Recharts library with PieChart, BarChart, and AreaChart
All charts have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Language toggle added to Elite Report page header for consistency
Backend keyword_trends returns nested objects for some keywords - frontend filters these correctly
All 6 metrics cards display correct data from API response
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - used existing HITL data from previous iterations

recharts_charts.area_chart: Risk Timeline - Stacked area chart with Level 1/2/3
recharts_charts.keywords_bar: Horizontal bar chart for top detected keywords

hitl_analytics_page.moderator_performance: Table showing Admin user with 2 approve_as_is actions
hitl_analytics_page.export_buttons: JSON and CSV export buttons working

elite_report_page.language_toggle: Added ID/EN toggle to header - working
elite_report_page.elite_plus_tab: Shows upgrade notice for non-Elite+ users

elite_progress_tab.module_breakdown: Shows Quarterly, Parent-Child, Business, Team usage

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 14 tested HITL Analytics Dashboard with Recharts charts and language toggle across pages. All backend HITL endpoints working (overview, timeline, moderator-performance, export). Frontend shows 6 metrics cards, 4 Recharts charts (Pie, Bar, Area, horizontal Bar), moderator table, and export buttons. Language toggle added to Elite Report page. Test user (test@test.com) has tier='elite'. Admin user (admin@relasi4warna.com) required for HITL Analytics access.
